label: 中国
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Third of four grades of provinces (kuni); divided according to their population and importance. The medium provinces were Awa- [in the Tōkaidō], Wakasa-, Noto-, Sado-, Tango-, Iwami-, Nagato-, Tosa-, Hyūga-, Ōsumi-, and Satsuma-no-kuni. Key- kuni. [国、安房、東海道、若狭、能登、佐渡、丹後、石見、長門、土佐、日向、大隅、薩摩国]
